textBeforeTable: Deluxe Banded Featherbed Cover accommodates the lofty down bed and has zippers on 3 sides for easy removal. 100% cotton sateen 400 threadcount. $5900 26 lbs 72x84 BCDK0C21 $5900 26 lbs 80x82 BCDK0K21 $5500 19 lbs 62x82 BCDK0Q16 $4700 15 lbs 54x79 BCDK0F13 $3700 12 lbs Twin 43x79 BCDK0T11 Price
textAfterTable: New Item Connoisseur's Choice BodyCloud Quintessential Royale Down Bed. We listened to one of our happy customers, who said she loved her Quintessential down bed so much she bought a second one to go on top. Introducing the BodyCloud Royale with a 6" gusset and 50% more fill than the 4" gusset, so there is more exquisite luxury for you to sink into. It does compress down a little, so don't worry about it being too high. Our banded luxury 400 thread count cover with zippers on 3 sides accommodates the luxurious height and allows for easy removal. This is the next best thing to a down mattress. 6 " Gusset BodyCloud Down Bed Item Number Size Weight Price BCRQT17 Twin 43x79 15lbs
